mapper.select: SELECT o.`id`,c.`name` carName,t1.`name` getcity,t2.`name` backcity,o.`oprice`,o.`status` FROM sys_car c, sys_order o, sys_city t1, sys_city t2, sys_user u WHERE o.`cid`=c.`id`AND o.`getid`=t1.`id` AND o.`backid`=t2.`id`AND o.`uid`=u.`id` AND o.`uid`=#{uid} and o.code=0
